Summary: Observed a white light in trees on right side of car.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Palos Hills
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWE WERE ON IL 83 GOING SE NEAR RIDGLAND AVE IN A WOODED AREA My wife was driving i was in the passenger seat my mother was in backseat. my mother 89yoa saw a bright light in trees she told us to look at it. I OBSERVED A CONE SHAPED WHITE LIGHT IN TRESS THE CONE THEN RETRACTED INTO A TRIAGLE UFO I OBSERVED THE LIGHT ENTERED THE UFO THEN SAW LIGHTED CIRCLE IN THE CENTER OF THE CRAFT. REVEALED THE OUTLINE OF CRAFT. IN THE DARK IT DISAPEARED.
